ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Skills questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yea, I forgot the stop attacking thingy too.  Hehe.  As far as instill doubt goes, its the hardest skill I have ever had to raise.  I hit the instill doubt
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yea, I forgot the stop attacking thingy too. Hehe. As far as instill
doubt goes, its the hardest skill I have ever had to raise. I hit the
instill doubt button constantly, targeting anything I can, and I think mine
is like 35th. And the key to getting it to work is make sure the ONLY thing
you are doing to your target is auto attack, no special attacks, and your
special attacks button has to be up (Tiger Claw, etc) and then hit your
instill doubt. Now, chances are the next result you will see is it telling
you "You aren't scaring anyone". Hehe if you are REALLY lucky and get it to
work (I think I have gotten it to work like 3 or 4 times), it should have
the same effect as the 4th level necro spell, and make them start to run
away for 10-30 seconds. Only you don't get the nifty flying skulls.

Sister SHelza

>From: "Currey, Mick" <mick_currey@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'" <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Skills questions
>Date: Thu, 16 Mar 2000 12:03:36 -0600
>
>Make sure to stop attacking for a sec before you fd. Then it should work a
>lot more than it fails at lvl 70 skill.
>
>Sneak is fantastic when you are the scout and mapping out a new dungeon.
>When other characters would get wiped out, you can sneak past guards.
>Hehe,
>when that fails, you just fd. Works out great. (You haven't had fun till
>you scout out a dungeon full of red mob's with another monk. You and the
>other monk can sneak around, fd when needed, then find lower level mobs to
>wipe out before the red ones find you.)
>
>Someone else will have to answer about instill doubt. I haven't had good
>luck with it either.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Juliebu@... [mailto:Juliebu@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2000 11:59 AM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Skills questions

> From: Juliebu@...
>

>all.

>ringing
> in my ears) and my skill is up to around 70, but it's only
>worked one
> time. Will this ever be useful? Also what good is sneak
>and instill
> doubt?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Daina
